app.form.title: Inscription
app.form.about.you.title: About you
app.form.about.you.description: To complete your inscription, you can use the information on your driver license. You can help yourself with the numbers displayed directly on your license to fill in the required information in this online form.
app.form.first.name: First name
app.form.last.name: Last name
app.form.address.title: Your address
app.form.address.description: Fill in your official residence address. If you have moved, please provide the address on your driver license.
app.home.title: Digital Driver License
app.home.subtitle: Proof of Concept
app.home.description: This site allows you to explore the technical concepts to support the service of issuing a verifiable digital driving license certificate.
app.conditions.title: Conditions of use
app.conditions.description.p1: This is a proof of concept for a verifiable digital credentialing service that is NOT used for production purposes. This service exists to demonstrate the form that could take a verifiable digital certificate of digital driving license, that a person might receive from a government, such as that of Quebec. This certificate is a reliable digital version that contains information generally issued by governments on a physical medium, such as a driving license or passport. In a "real" version of an issuing service, people would have to undergo an identity verification process before the digital certificate is issued to them. The information contained in the credential would be sourced from the authority that holds that information. For more information about Digital Identity and Trust demonstrated with this service, please consult the site of {link} (only French version).
app.conditions.description.p2: The verifiable digital certificate generated by this service can only be used with the proof of concept of this service for issuing verifiable digital certificates of digital driving license and is not intended for production. The basis of this service is an open source application that makes it easy to deploy this issuer of verifiable digital certificates. Any questions regarding this service or the project can be addressed via the {repoexpmdl}. Contributions to the project are also welcome!
app.conditions.description.p3: Please do not use your own personal information in this service. This is not a production service and the data you provide should not be based on your own personal information. The information collected is simply what you would have entered into the form for exploratory purposes for this proof of concept and this is reset regularly.
app.conditions.description.p4: If you have any questions about this service or our collection or use of personal information, please direct your inquiries to the gouvernment identity credentials team
app.conditions.limitations.title: Limitation of responsibilities.
app.conditions.limitations.description.p: Under no circumstances will the Government of Quebec be liable to any person or business entity for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or other damages based on any use of this website or any other website to which this site is linked, including, without limitation, any lost profits, business interruption, or loss of programs or information, even if the Government of Quebec has been specifically advised of the possibility of such damages.
app.conditions.engagement.description: I accept the conditions of the undertaking
app.qrcode.title: Digital credential
app.qrcode.instructions: Present this digital credential when required to transmit your digital driver license information
app.qrcode.info.title: Access your digital credential with the help of your mobile phone
app.qrcode.info.p1: The digital credential service was designed to be well displayed on your mobile device. You can use it whenever you are on the road.
app.qrcode.info.p4: Simplified access to your digital driver license credential
app.result.title: Issued identity information
app.result.message.title: Your credential has been successfully issued.
app.result.message.description: The information of your driver license has been successfully issued. To test the verification of this credential you can visit the auditor's site.
